<small>Hebrew form: **<big>[[H0579|אָנָה]]</big>**</small>
 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָאן‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Ezra.7.19|Ezra 7:19]]</sup> ==vessel, utensil== ([[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָ(א)ן‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, so Christian-Palestinian Aramaic, [[BDB#Schulth|Schulth]]<sup>Lex. 106</sup>; Old Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מאן‎</span>, Phoenician <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מנן‎</span>; possibly √ <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎אנה‎</span>, see Biblical Hebrew II.  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אנה‎</span>, compare [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 183</sup> [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]]); — plural, ***vessels*** of temple at Jerusalem: emphatic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָאנַיָּא‎</span> [[Ezra.5.14|Ezra 5:14]]; [[Ezra.5.15|Ezra 5:15]]; [[Ezra.7.19|Ezra 7:19]]; [[Dan.5.23|Dan 5:23]] construct <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎מָאנֵי‎</span> v[[Dan.5.2|Dan 5:2]] v[[Dan.5.3|Dan 5:3]]; [[Ezra.6.5|Ezra 6:5]]. <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎עמגִלָּה‎</span> see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎גלל‎</span>.
